comment.body: Dont write for me stupid sistem ¬¬

Yep, this is portable, just be sure to move your config files with you. You can even run same ID on multiple places. Not really need to save all, your ID can be back to any ZeroNet instance just by putting back it's config.
I think your computer has cancer and is about to die. Really, idk what is that flag. Go to the documentation instead to ask Users who may know a shit about Zeronet or computing at all.
I love how the image gets hided unless you wanna show content. No more dick miniatures guessing if are dicks or mushrooms :D

@Cablecat: The better if you run a VM then shit inside :-) I moved to 24/7 Linux 3 years ago and i will never fallback to Windows. I fear about shit under the hood, and the MS Registry. I have tweaked my cinnamon to look like W10 (logo included) so no one will see me as Nerd :D I told always is W10 Supreme Edition :D but is Linux at all..
